H0.text: which is the ring finger for male in india. Right Index Finger

H1.text: which is the ring finger for male in india. Left Middle Finger

H2.text: which is the ring finger for male in india. Right Thumb

H3.text: which is the ring finger for male in india. left ring finger

A4.text: In India, a ring (which is not called a wedding ring) is still worn on the left hand.

A5.text: In western culture, a wedding ring is typically worn on the base of the left ring finger.
